text: Northern Chamber Orchestra is a chamber orchestra based in Manchester, England. Established in 1967, the orchestra gives concerts at Heritage Centre, Macclesfield and The Stoller Hall, Manchester as well as a Christmas concert at Tatton Park, Knutsford and one-off engagements around the country. They are also currently the resident orchestra for the Buxton Festival. ==Discography== ;Studio albums * Magnificat BWV 243 / Cantata "Ich habe genug" BWV 82 (1995) ==References== Category:Orchestras Category:Musical groups from Manchester Category:Musical groups established in 1967 Category:1967 establishments in England
title: Northern Chamber Orchestra
